name: Untitled.exe (Swordtooth)
description:
A game created in scratch where the clones have been hit by an accidental nuclear blast. You must use what materials you have around you to try and survive. 

===How To Play=============================

Controls:

Click the start button, silly

Move mouse left or right to move to different sides of 

the house or arrow keys.

'W' to close/open the closest door/blinds on current 

screen.

'S' to turn on/off the lights.

Police arrive at 7:00.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Enemys:

---Window Man-----------------------------------------------------

If it is walking by: Turn off light using 'S' and keep the 

blinds open.

If it is at window: Close blinds using 'W' and keep the 

lights on until you don't hear breathing.

---Smiler-------------------------------------------------------------

Don't keep the closet door closed too long or else it'll 

get you. Open/Close closet doors using 'W'.

---Ceiling Man------------------------------------------------------

You can hear when it leaves or arrives, if it is in the 

closet, close the closet till it leaves. Rinse and repeat.

---Door Keeper-----------------------------------------------------

Every once in a while it will lean more and more out of 

the door, when it is fully leaning out of the back door 

close the door and wait for it to move. If it is still at the 

door, you did a good job, if it is gone you must close 

the door till it moves again. If you keep the door closed 

before it starts leaning out the door then it will get you.

---Shadow Man----------------------------------------------------

He lurks under your couch, the longer you wait, the 

closer he becomes. Flicker the lights on and off to 

send him back...

=========================================

[Transmission:]

Transmitter: Test location 12, Id is 6L4S7 and I was wondering if you all launched [REDACTED].

Receiver: No I don't think we did, but if you want I can check with head council.

Transmitter: Alright, that would be great.

Receiver: Okay, it'll be a minute.

...

Receiver: Did the bomb launch on its own?

Transmitter: yes

...

Receiver: Where exactly did you detonate [REDACTED] for?

Transmitter: we did not, it must have recalibrated.

Receiver: It seems to be on trajectory for America's center

Transmitter: Wait, where?

Receiver: South Dakota

Transmitter: But, I see it...

Receiver: Sir, where are you?

Transmitter: It's... So... Bright.. And... Pretty.

Receiver: Sir, please leave the area.

Transmitter:

Receiver: Sir?

Transmitter:

Receiver: SIR?!

[Transmission terminated]

Results:

Impact: 4,023

Entity: 43.678 Billion
